short.ar: انضم إلى المعركة التي تجتاح غزو الزومبي مع Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.am: ከዞምቢ ወረራ ጋር የሚደረገውን ከባድ ውጊያ ከድሪፍት ካርስ ዞምቢ ስማሸር ጋር ተቀላቀል።
short.bg: Присъединете се към увлекателната битка срещу зомби инвазията с Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.bn: ড্রিফট কার জম্বি স্ম্যাশারের সাথে জম্বি আক্রমণের বিরুদ্ধে আকর্ষণীয় লড়াইয়ে যোগ দিন।
short.ca: Uneix-te a l'apassionant batalla contra la invasió zombi amb Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.cs: Připojte se k napínavé bitvě proti invazi zombie s Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.da: Deltag i den gribende kamp mod zombieinvasionen med Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.de: Schließe dich dem packenden Kampf gegen die Zombie-Invasion mit Drift Cars Zombie Smasher an.
short.el: Πάρτε μέρος στη συναρπαστική μάχη ενάντια στην εισβολή ζόμπι με το Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Join the gripping battle against the zombie invasion with Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.es: Únete a la apasionante batalla contra la invasión zombie con Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.et: Liituge haarava lahinguga zombie sissetungi vastu Drift Cars Zombie Smasheriga.
short.fa: پیوستن به نبرد جذاب در برابر تهاجم زامبی با ماشین رانش له کننده زامبی.
short.fi: Liity mukaansatempaavaan taisteluun zombien hyökkäystä vastaan Drift Cars Zombie Smasherissa.
short.fil: Sumali sa gripping labanan laban sa zombie pagsalakay sa Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.fr: Rejoignez la bataille captivante contre l’invasion de zombies avec Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.gu: ડ્રિફ્ટ કાર્સ ઝોમ્બી સ્મેશર સાથે ઝોમ્બી આક્રમણ સામે પકડની લડાઇમાં જોડાઓ.
short.he: הצטרפו לקרב המרתק נגד פלישת הזומבים עם Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.hi: ड्रिफ्ट कार्स ज़ोंबी स्मैशर के साथ ज़ोंबी आक्रमण के खिलाफ मनोरंजक लड़ाई में शामिल हों।
short.hr: Pridružite se napetoj borbi protiv invazije zombija sa Drift Cars zombi razbijačem.
short.hu: Csatlakozz a zombiinvázió elleni lebilincselő csatához a Drift Cars Zombie Smasher segítségével.
short.id: Bergabunglah dalam pertempuran mencekam melawan invasi zombie dengan Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.it: Unisciti all'avvincente battaglia contro l'invasione zombie con Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.ja: ドリフトカーゾンビスマッシャーでゾンビの侵略とのグリップの戦いに参加してください。
short.kn: ಡ್ರಿಫ್ಟ್ ಕಾರ್ಸ್ ಝಾಂಬಿ ಸ್ಮಾಷರ್ ಅವರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಝಾಂಬಿ ಆಕ್ರಮಣದ ವಿರುದ್ಧದ ಹೋರಾಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
short.ko: Drift Cars Zombie Smasher로 좀비 침공에 맞서 치열한 전투에 참여하세요.
short.lv: Pievienojieties aizraujošajai cīņai pret zombiju iebrukumu ar Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.ml: ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റ് കാർസ് സോംബി സ്മാഷറുമായി സോമ്പി ആക്രമണത്തിനെതിരായ പോരാട്ടത്തിൽ ചേരുക.
short.mr: ड्रिफ्ट कार्स झोम्बी स्मॅशरसह झोम्बी आक्रमणाविरुद्धच्या मनोरंजक लढाईत सामील व्हा.
short.ms: Sertai pertempuran yang mencengkam menentang pencerobohan zombie dengan Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.nl: Doe mee aan de meeslepende strijd tegen de zombie-invasie met Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.no: Bli med i den gripende kampen mot zombieinvasjonen med Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.pl: Dołącz do wciągającej walki z inwazją zombie z Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.ro: Alătură-te luptei captivante împotriva invaziei zombilor cu Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.ru: Присоединяйтесь к захватывающей битве против вторжения зомби с Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.sk: Pripojte sa k pútavému boju proti invázii zombie s Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.sl: Pridružite se napeti bitki proti invaziji zombi z Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.sv: Gå med i den gripande striden mot zombieinvasionen med Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.
short.sw: Kujiunga na vita ya mtego dhidi ya uvamizi zombie na Drift Magari zombie Smasher.
short.ta: டிரிப்ட் கார்ஸ் ஜாம்பி ஸ்மாஷர் உடன் ஜாம்பி படையெடுப்புக்கு எதிரான விறுவிறுப்பான போரில் சேருங்கள்.
short.te: డ్రిఫ్ట్ కార్స్ జాంబీ స్మాషర్ తో జాంబీ దండయాత్రకు వ్యతిరేకంగా గ్రిప్పింగ్ యుద్ధంలో పాల్గొనండి.
short.th: เข้าร่วมการต่อสู้ที่จับใจกับการบุกรุกของซอมบี้ด้วย Drift Cars Zombie Smasher
short.tr: Drift Cars Zombie Smasher ile zombi istilasına karşı sürükleyici savaşa katılın.
short.uk: Приєднуйтесь до захоплюючої битви проти вторгнення зомбі з Drift Cars Zombie Smasher.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to a drifting world crowned by realistic graphics and realistic car sounds. Drift Cars Zombie Smasher represents the pinnacle of zombie-crushing games that offer an extraordinary gaming experience. Fight the zombie invasion using your drift skills and clear the scary world by crushing it under your vehicle's tires.

There are three different drift car options in the game, but the others are locked except for the first vehicle. To reach these special vehicles, you must complete the levels with courage and skill. You will struggle through fifteen levels in total. Although things seem easy at first, the game becomes more challenging as the number of zombies increases, and the danger increases.

The aim of the game is quite simple, clearing the infested areas from zombies. The way to achieve this job is to fight against zombies by using your mobility and drifting skills. Drift your car skillfully and eliminate the zombies. Between the rustling of tires and the engine's roar, you will use all your skills to defeat these creatures trying to take over the fearful world.

Combining the concepts of drift games and zombie games, this game will lock you on the screen by combining tension and action. This experience brings a different breath to car games; you will improve your drifting skills and experience adrenaline-filled moments by fighting against the zombie invasion. Get behind the wheel, crush the zombies, and lighten the dark world.

How To Play
You can move your vehicle with WASD keys. You can activate the nitro by using the F key to accelerate your vehicle where necessary.

Drift Cars Zombie Smasher Game Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 3D Graphics
✓ 3 Different Car
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Drift Cars Zombie Smasher Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
